scent.description: Exclusive. The fluffiest marshmallows are mixed with glistening snowflakes, and piled high with fluffy whipped cream, all sprinkled onto lush Evergreen tree. Snowy, yummy, and clean.
Super alluring! Juicy, ripe fruit is candy-coated with vanilla sugar.
Masculine and fresh. Vibrant Bergamot and fresh green notes, are complimented by earthy Oakmoss and white patchouli.
The irresistible goodness of crisp pears; ripe, delicious, and juicy.
Top notes of citrus and anise on a heart of mild jasmine, honeysuckle, lavandin, warm musk, cedarwood, and fresh air.
Fresh, warm evening air wafts with lime, French lavender, lily, and light earthiness.
Our tart Genuine Green Apples go gourmand, infused with light, airy pastry, then rolled in warm sugar.
We've layered our yummy Vanilla Cake with our Frosted Black Raspberry and Vanilla Cream
We wanted only the best orange in our Fresh Cotton Candy, so we spin it with authentic, splashy Blood Orange. A perfect candy delight.
Buttered blond sugar cane, Madagascar vanilla, a drop of maple, and lemon zest, create the best buttercream frosting, smoothed over moist strawberry cupcakes. Mouth-watering!

Our ButterMint Cupcakes smoothed with our fresh, Buttercream frosting of butter, , blonde sugar cane, Madagascar vanilla, maple, and a base of vanilla extract, then we sprinkle them with the butteriest buttermints.

Exclusive. Our decadent, Cake Me Now, warm vanilla sugar, delectable pink frosting, pink cotton candy, sugared lemon sprinkles, drizzled caramel, raspberry jam, all topped with fluffy, puffy marshmallows.
A sparkling, well-rounded scent with a natural down sweetness, balanced by wafts of Blood Orange, with a powdered sugar finish. Addictive.
Crisp champagne bubbles are delightfully blended with tangy grapefruit, champagne grapes and deep plum.
Fresh-picked, juicy watermelon perfectly sweetens our effervescent champagne, creating a refreshing delight.
Our Cherry on Top is topped with soft, white marshmallows, and sugared deep, red cherries.
Masculine spice and lavender combined with citrus and warm cedar wood. We think you'll like it even better than Drakkar Noir.
Frozen mango dusted with pink sugar, raspberry sorbet, champagne bubbles, freesia and light cashmere musk
A Best Seller...Authentic and freshly-spun pink Cotton Candy, just like the colorful, sweet treat at the fair!
Our fresh cotton Candy goes for a spin with our warm, buttery Sugar Cookies.
Sweet, warm funnel cake pastry made of buttery cream and milky caramelized sugar, sprinkled with confectioner's sugar, topped with freshly-baked candied pears.

scent.scentname: Frosted Black Raspberry and Vanilla Cream
scent.description: Ripe, sugared Black Raspberries marry with velvety, fresh vanilla cream. Miss this fragrance? Ours is better.

Frosted Fruit Cupcakesare moist with juicy oranges and dripping peaches, then smoothed with our delicious Buttercream frosting of butter, blonde sugar cane, Madagascar vanilla, maple, and a base of vanilla extract.
Tart peel gives way to fresh sweetness of crisp apple. Super juicy!
An amazingly fresh and sophisticated blend of ruby cassis, ripe pineapple, sweet rose blossoms and dewy fresh air.
True, tart green apple meets swfeet gumballs, right from the gumball machine.
Splashy and sparkling. We've rounded out our cranberries tartness by frosting them with white sugar. Bright, clean, and festive, even for the everyday celebration.
Buttery, warm perfection. Simmered rum, swirled with lightly salted butter, topped with fresh cool whipped cream, a sprinkle of nutmeg, a sweet dash of toasted coconut with slight billows of vanilla.
It's everything you love about "Pink", only better. Neroli and peony complemented with notes of violet and juniper berries.
Peppermint shavings, clean, authentic, and refreshing.
Fragrant and juicy lemons, right from the tree, blended into our frozen, slightly sweet treat. Super refreshing!
Classic! Straight from the gumball machine.
Warm candy essence, slight jasmine note, fresh vanilla bean, rich caramel, hint of musk, and soothing cream.
You can't get more fresh then lavender or more clean than lemon. Splash them together, and Ahhh!
The freshness of new-fallen snow, and mild notes of lavender and billows of vanilla.
Authentic dark roast coffee...infused with steamed soy milk, and the slightest hint of vanilla.
Our own marshmallow scent. Fluffy, powdered sugar, sweet goodness. There's nothing like marshmallows.
Crisp, champagne bubbles are delightfully blended with sugared berries, tangy grapefruit, candied champagne grapes, and deep plum.
A fruity whirl of cotton candy, lemon drops, deep caramel, and raspberry jam, with a dry down base.
Luscious Strawberry, Wild Goji Berries, Ripe Raspberry, Gardenia Petals, Frosted Jasmine, Peach Nectar, White Amber, Coconut Musk, Creamy Vanilla.
Freshly diced, juicy pear and chunks of island banana whirled into a smoothie, and topped with shredded coconut. A nectar of tropical delights!
Fresh-from-the-tree pears, perfectly accompany sweet spun cotton candy.
An alluring blend of sweet citrus, jasmine, water lily, sweet pea and white orchid.
Sweet and tart lemonade made from juicy, sugared pink lemons, and stirred with our bright Pink Sugar.
Sparkling pink bubbles of crisp champagne blended with tangy grapefruit, champagne grapes, deep plum, and a rim of glistening pink sugar.
Super alluring. The perfect balance of pink sugared berries, warm spun sugar, bright, natural cherry, hints of vanilla, and a beautiful fresh finish.
Warm, buttery down gives way to a deep berry middle, while fresh caramel is completed by a slightly salted waft of vanilla.
Fresh, clean fragrance of zesty lime and clean mint.
Juicy, bright pomegranate blended with hints of peach, strawberry and just a drop orange.
Feminine fruit and floral blend of osmanthus, apple and water lily, middle notes of honeysuckle, jasmine, and lotus; base notes of iris, musk, and cashmere wood.
Juicy, authentic, red strawberries, straight from the vine.
Buttery sugar cookies warm from the oven, sprinkled with the best thing that ever happened to them; pink sugar!
We've whipped our yummy Pink Sugar into huge, puffy, fluffy marshmallows. De-Lish!
Our Bare Pears couldn't resist taking a dip into our Pink Sugar. The result is fresh and juicy!
You can't help but smile with this sunny, happy, fragrance. Fresh air wafts with light floral notes.

A Best Seller...Warm funnel cake pastry made of buttery cream, and milky caramelized sugar, sprinkled with confectioner's sugar, surrounded by our freshly-spun cotton candy, all topped with fluffy whipped cream.
Our Sweet on You confection, topped with our juicy Sincerely Strawberries. Super delicious!
Tangy, fresh pink grapefruit with sweet valencia orange, mouth-watering clementine, and the softest of florals.
Authentic peaches are infused into puffy, fluffy, fresh marshmallows.
Authentic watermelon, juicy and fresh.
Decadent, moist vanilla-infused white cake, topped with creamy vanilla bean frosting, and sprinkled with warm vanilla sugar.
Fresh, ripe, sweet, and authentic for the true lover of black cherries. Hint of almond and orange, with slight cinnamon finish.
A delicate blend of orange nectar, star jasmine, and violet.
The essence of soothing White Tea brings a fresh spa scent.
Our luscious daiquiri is a refreshing blend of crisp bubbles, strawberries, lime zest, and a hint of fresh vanilla for balance.
